Package com.microsoft.azure.management.network

This package contains the classes for NetworkManagementClient.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Network
    Virtual network
    Network.DefinitionBlank
    The first stage of a virtual network definition.
    Network.DefinitionCreatable
    The stage of the virtual network definition which contains all the minimum required inputs for the resource to be created (via Creatable.create()), but also allows for any other optional settings to be specified, except for adding subnets.
    Network.DefinitionCreatableWithSubnet
    The stage of the public IP definition which contains all the minimum required inputs for the resource to be created (via Creatable.create()), but also allows for any other optional settings to be specified, including adding subnets.
    Network.Definitions
    The entirety of the virtual network definition.
    Network.DefinitionWithGroup
    The stage of the virtual network definition allowing to specify the resource group.
    Network.DefinitionWithSubnet
    The stage of the virtual network definition allowing to add subnets.
    Network.Update
    The template for a public IP address update operation, containing all the settings that can be modified.
    Network.UpdateWithSubnet
    The stage of the virtual network update allowing to add or remove subnets
    NetworkInterface
    Network interface.
    NetworkInterface.DefinitionBlank
    The first stage of the network interface.
    NetworkInterface.DefinitionCreatable
    The stage of the network interface definition which contains all the minimum required inputs for the resource to be created (via Creatable.create()), but also allows for any other optional settings to be specified.
    NetworkInterface.Definitions
    Container interface for all the definitions.
    NetworkInterface.DefinitionWithGroup
    The stage of the network interface definition allowing to specify the resource group.
    NetworkInterface.DefinitionWithNetwork
    The stage of the network interface definition allowing to specify the virtual network for primary Ip configuration.
    NetworkInterface.DefinitionWithPrivateIp<T>
    The stage of the network interface definition allowing to specify private IP address within a virtual network subnet.
    NetworkInterface.DefinitionWithPublicIpAddress
    The stage of the network interface definition allowing to associate public IP address with it's primary Ip configuration.
    NetworkInterface.DefinitionWithSubnet<T>
    The stage of the network interface definition allowing to specify subnet.
    NetworkInterface.Update
    The template for a network interface update operation, containing all the settings that can be modified.
    NetworkInterfaces
    Entry point to network interface management.
    Networks
    Entry point to virtual network management
    NetworkSecurityGroup
    Network security group.
    NetworkSecurityGroup.DefinitionBlank
    The first stage of the definition.
    NetworkSecurityGroup.DefinitionCreatable
    The stage of the definition which contains all the minimum required inputs for the resource to be created (via Creatable.create()), but also allows for any other optional settings to be specified.
    NetworkSecurityGroup.Definitions
    The entirety of the network security group definition.
    NetworkSecurityGroup.DefinitionWithGroup
    The stage of the definition allowing to specify the resource group.
    NetworkSecurityGroup.DefinitionWithRule
    The stage of the definition allowing to define a new security rule.
    NetworkSecurityGroup.Update
    The template for an update operation, containing all the settings that can be modified.
    NetworkSecurityGroup.UpdateWithRule
    The stage of the resource definition allowing to add or remove security rules.
    NetworkSecurityGroups
    Entry point to network security group management.
    NetworkSecurityRule
    A network security rule in a network security group.
    NetworkSecurityRule.DefinitionAttachable<ParentT>
    The final stage of the security rule definition.
    NetworkSecurityRule.DefinitionBlank<ParentT>
    The first stage of the subnet definition.
    NetworkSecurityRule.Definitions<ParentT>
    The entirety of a network security rule definition.
    NetworkSecurityRule.DefinitionWithDestinationAddress<ParentT>
    The stage of the network rule definition allowing the destination address to be specified.
    NetworkSecurityRule.DefinitionWithDestinationPort<ParentT>
    The stage of the network rule definition allowing the destination port(s) to be specified.
    NetworkSecurityRule.DefinitionWithDirectionAccess<ParentT>
    The stage of the network rule definition allowing the direction and the access type to be specified.
    NetworkSecurityRule.DefinitionWithProtocol<ParentT>
    The stage of the security rule definition allowing the protocol that the rule applies to to be specified.
    NetworkSecurityRule.DefinitionWithSourceAddress<ParentT>
    The stage of the network rule definition allowing the source address to be specified.
    NetworkSecurityRule.DefinitionWithSourcePort<ParentT>
    The stage of the network rule definition allowing the source port(s) to be specified.
    NicIpConfiguration
    An Ip configuration in a network interface.
    NicIpConfiguration.DefinitionAttachable<parentT>
    Attaches the Ip configuration to the parent network interface.
    NicIpConfiguration.DefinitionBlank<parentT>
    The first stage of Ip configuration definition.
    NicIpConfiguration.Definitions<parentT>
    Container interface for all the definitions.
    NicIpConfiguration.DefinitionWithNetwork<parentT>
    The stage of the Ip configuration definition allowing to specify the virtual network.
    NicIpConfiguration.DefinitionWithPrivateIp<parentT>
    The stage of the Ip configuration definition allowing to specify private IP address within a virtual network subnet.
    NicIpConfiguration.DefinitionWithPublicIpAddress<parentT>
    The stage of the Ip configuration definition allowing to associate it with a public IP address.
    NicIpConfiguration.DefinitionWithSubnet<T>
    The stage of the Ip configuration definition allowing to specify subnet.
    NicIpConfiguration.Update<parentT>
    The template for a ip configuration update operation, containing all the settings that can be modified.
    PublicIpAddress
    Public IP address.
    PublicIpAddress.DefinitionBlank
    The first stage of a public IP address definition.
    PublicIpAddress.DefinitionCreatable
    The stage of the public IP definition which contains all the minimum required inputs for the resource to be created (via Creatable.create()), but also allows for any other optional settings to be specified.
    PublicIpAddress.Definitions
    Container interface for all the definitions.
    PublicIpAddress.DefinitionWithGroup
    The stage of the public IP address definition allowing to specify the resource group.
    PublicIpAddress.DefinitionWithIpAddress
    A public IP address definition allowing to set the IP allocation method (static or dynamic).
    PublicIpAddress.DefinitionWithLeafDomainLabel
    A public IP address definition allowing to specify the leaf domain label, if any.
    PublicIpAddress.DefinitionWithReverseFQDN<T>
    A public IP address definition allowing the reverse FQDN to be specified
    PublicIpAddress.Update
    The template for a public IP address update operation, containing all the settings that can be modified.
    PublicIpAddress.UpdateWithIpAddress
    A public IP address update allowing to change the IP allocation method (static or dynamic).
    PublicIpAddress.UpdateWithLeafDomainLabel
    A public IP address update allowing to change the leaf domain label, if any.
    PublicIpAddress.UpdateWithReverseFQDN
    A public IP address update allowing the reverse FQDN to be specified
    PublicIpAddresses
    Entry point to public IP address management.
    Subnet
    A subnet of a virtual network
    Subnet.Definition<ParentT>
    The entirety of a Subnet definition.
    Subnet.DefinitionAttachable<ParentT>
    The final stage of the subnet definition.
    Subnet.DefinitionBlank<ParentT>
    The first stage of the subnet definition.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NetworkSecurityRule.Access
    The possible access types supported by a network security rule.
    NetworkSecurityRule.Direction
    The possible directions of the network traffic supported by a network security rule.
    NetworkSecurityRule.Protocol
    The possible Azure network protocols supported by a network security rule.

Package com.microsoft.azure.management.network Description

This package contains the classes for NetworkManagementClient. The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resrources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.
